title: Gather requirements
description: Collect all requirements from stakeholders for redesign.

title: Create wireframes
description: Design initial wireframes for homepage and subpages.

title: Define app scope
description: Write down main features and scope of the mobile app.

title: UI/UX draft
description: Prepare UI/UX draft for the mobile app screens.

title: Identify repetitive tasks
description: Discuss with QA and DevOps to find tasks suitable for automation.

title: Write automation scripts
description: Create Python scripts to automate found tasks.

title: Brainstorm campaign ideas
description: Collect possible approaches for product marketing campaign.

title: Create promotional materials
description: Design posters, digital ads, and social media content.
